hcc_text: Allerton Avenue is a pedestrian high crash corridor (top third for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile in the Bronx)
info: At Allerton Avenue at Bronx Park East, Bx River Parkway Nb Exit 8 East and Dr Kazimiroff Boulevard, there was 1 severe injury in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Allerton Avenue at Bronx Park East, Bx River Parkway Nb Exit 8 East and Dr Kazimiroff Boulevard
